thread.section_title: Hotel Monge - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Super hotel
thread.title_full: Super hotel - Review of Hotel Monge, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Sarah P
title: Super hotel
text:
Very quiet on the 6th floor with lovely shower and excellent comfy bed - just right for weary feet after a day out and about! Nice staff. We didn't have breakfast in and it would be a lovely touch if there was an opportunity to make a drink in the room. You can only get tea/coffee after 11 in the lounge. Metro stations either 1 minute or 5 minute walk depending which line you need. You can feel the metro in the hotel so the higher your room the better. Green space of old amphitheatre behind hotel. For the price, near Notre dame, on 6 nations match weekend , was good.
Room Tip: Higher you are less you will feel the metro See more room tips
